Package piece

Class PieceFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • piece.PieceFactory
  • public class PieceFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    PieceFactory is a class which can start "building" a piece, add attributes, moves, and an icon, then getPiece() will return that new piece.
    Author:
    Alexander

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      PieceFactory()
      Makes pieces, finds their picture, assigns a team, and adds moves.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Add a MoveClass to the current piece.

      Add hardcoded standard moves.

      Add the moves to the piece.
      void addMoveSet​(MoveSet ms)
      Add a MoveSet to the current piece.
      Piece getPiece()
      Gets the piece from the piece factory.
      void setImage​(java.lang.String set, java.lang.String color, java.lang.String piece)
      Finds and sets the image of a piece, based on its set, team color, and piece name.
      void startPiece​(Team team, java.lang.String piece, java.lang.String set)
      Starts a piece's construction.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PieceFactory

        public PieceFactory()
        Makes pieces, finds their picture, assigns a team, and adds moves. To add more later.

    • Method Detail

      • startPiece

        public void startPiece​(Team team,
                       java.lang.String piece,
                       java.lang.String set)
        Starts a piece's construction.
        Parameters:
        team - The team of the piece.
        piece - The name/type of this piece.
        set - The set/variant this is from. "standard" is the normal set.

      • setImage

        public void setImage​(java.lang.String set,
                     java.lang.String color,
                     java.lang.String piece)
        Finds and sets the image of a piece, based on its set, team color, and piece name. All elements lowercase.
        Parameters:
        set - The set. For example, standard, chaturanga, etc.
        color - The team color.
        piece - The piece name.

      • getPiece

        public Piece getPiece()
        Gets the piece from the piece factory. You cannot get the same piece twice. You must start a new one.
        Returns:
        The piece which has been worked on.

      • addMoveSet

        public void addMoveSet​(MoveSet ms)
        Add a MoveSet to the current piece.
        Parameters:
        ms - The MoveSet to be added.

      • addMoveClass

        public void addMoveClass​(MoveClass mc)
        Add a MoveClass to the current piece.
        Parameters:
        mc - The MoveClass to be added.

      • addMoves

        public void addMoves()
        Add hardcoded standard moves.

      • addMoves

        public void addMoves​(boolean hardcoded)
        Add the moves to the piece.
        Parameters:
        hardcoded - if true, uses standard chess moves.
